column4: I dont mind messing with terminal a little bit, but i prefer not to, does anyone know a upnp media server that is easy to use? or anyone can guide me with MediaTomb? I added my folder "Downloads" and it doesnt show the sub-directories of it....
mediatomb is fiddly as hell to get going
I use minidlna, but you will need to use the terminal a little to get it set up
once it's going it's pretty much rock solid
does it refresh the directories automatically?
yes, mostly
I've managed to catch it out
catch it out?
very occasionally when I drop a bunch of stuff into a directory under circumstances I can never quite replicate, it doesn't update properly
usually restarting it cures the problem, and if that doesn't I just delete its database and let it re-index the content
i'm really surprised theres no easy to use program with a gui :/
it seems that if I add files to it when my PS3 is actively streaming stuff, it doesn't update properly
it's a server
why would a server have a GUI?
to set it up...
I don't understand
im talking about setting up which folders the server would share
oh, you just list those in the config file
so what else should be tweaked before its ready to go?
ok anyway i'll try it now! thanks :)
I literally just changed the line that says media_dir=/whatever to point to where I put video
